main.name: Aulia Afriza
main.description: I am a frontend engineer and I use react, react native, javascript and typescript to develop pages
main.bio: Experienced Frontend Developer with a demonstrated history of working in the information technology and services industry. Skilled in PHP, Information Research, C++, Gitlab, Github, Bitbucket, R, React Native, Ionic, Storybook, Java, ReactJS, Opencv, Typescript, Python, Information Retrieval and OpenGL. Strong engineering professional with a Master degree focused in Computer Science from Institut Pertanian Bogor (IPB). strong with analysis in big data and have 2 journal publish in JIKA and IJASEIT. Journal publish in JIKA about hoax analysis with rocchio classification and for journal publish in IJASEIT about Information Extraction of Compound-Protein Interaction from Scientific Paper using Machine Learning.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: research about text mining and bioinformatics. information extraction of compound protein interactions in a collection abstract document containts compound sentences. main subject : artificial intelligence | data mining | nature languange processing | information retrieval

Activities and societies: skripsi metode klasifikasi rocchio untuk analisis hoax (rocchio classification for hoax analysis) Activities and societies: skripsi metode klasifikasi rocchio untuk analisis hoax (rocchio classification for hoax analysis). main subject : artificial intelligence | data mining | nature languange processing | information retrieval
